content:
A photo of Sofia Vergara’s dress has left the internet talking, with many thinking it was a case of wardrobe malfunction. The viral post has had fans fooled as they initially assumed it to be a fashion mishap. The 53-year-old recently shared a selfie on Instagram from the set of the reality TV show, “America’s Got Talent.” What netizens thought was a wardrobe malfunction turned out to be an optical illusion due to the placement of the microphone.

Sofia Vergara’s dress does more with less

Sofia Vergara’s photo in a plunging dress sparked wardrobe malfunction rumors on social media. On August 21, the “Modern Family” alum posted a selfie on Instagram from the set of “America’s Got Talent.” She wore a cleavage-baring outfit made of white lacy fabric. While she looked absolutely gorgeous, something else grabbed fans’ attention.

At first glance, fans apparently assumed Vergara had experienced a fashion mishap. Later, social media users realized that it was indeed an optical illusion. Due to the diva’s dress having a deep cutout over her chest, the beige-colored microphone’s placement made it look like an NSFW photo. The post has garnered over 687K likes at the time of writing.

Netizens shared their thoughts over the faux slip in the comments section. One user joked, “I thought, you thought, we thought.” Another wrote, “We all zoomed,” while someone directly asked, “What’s that thing in the left?” Most claimed that they had to zoom in to learn the truth. A few even apologized to Vergara for inspecting her photo closely.

One individual quipped, “Anybody else think that mic clip was a nip slip?” Although the selfie has fooled the internet, fans also praised the “AGT” judge and called her “beautiful” and “stunning.”

The “Hot Pursuit” actor donned a bodycon white lace dress in the stunning photo. With long sleeves and a diamond-shaped cutout over the chest, the outfit looked ethereal on her. She completed her look with nude makeup and straight hair that she let loose.

Aside from this photo, the 53-year-old also shared pictures posing with her fellow judges — Howie Mandel, Melanie Brown, and Simon Cowell.

The post Sofia Vergara’s Plunging Dress Has Internet Fooled About ‘Wardrobe Malfunction’ appeared first on Reality Tea.
summary: A photo of Sofia Vergara's plunging dress has caused many to believe it was a wardrobe malfunction. The 53-year-old actress recently shared a selfie on Instagram from the set of "America's Got Talent" and sparked rumors. However, due to the placement of the microphone, fans discovered that it was an optical illusion. The post has been shared over 687K times and has been viewed as a humorous by fans.
shortSummary: Sofia Vergara’s plunging dress, photographed on Instagram, caused a social media sensation as a wardrobe malfunction due to the microphone placement, which turned out to be an optical illusion.
